sentences.sContent: She was in constant physical pain.
the physical and emotional needs of young adults
Don’t be put off by his physical appearance .
sentences.sCn: 别因为他的外貌讨厌他。

sentences.sContent: He was obsessed with physical fitness .
...What mattered most was the residents’ physical health and mental status...
...What bothers me about the death of the wallet is the change it represents in our physical environment...

...The physical act of crying is mainly one of breathing in air...
...Does this spell the doom of the physical book...
...is the overall best exercise for regular physical activity...
...Hunger isn't controlled solely by the physical characteristics of a recent meal...
...which allows physical assets to be divided and consumed as services...
...A study in Sweden indicated that kindergarten children who could play in a natural environment had less illness and greater physical ability than children used only to a normal playground...
...M: Can you help me work out a physical training program John...
...It is easy to accept that genes control physical characteristics such as sex...
...Campus construction is of vital importance not only to the physical development of students but to their mental health as well...
